text: Anyone here can help me to cross validate my thought process about some data processing I am doing ?

elements.text: Anyone here can help me to cross validate my thought process about some data processing I am doing ?

text: write tests / unit tests to lower the probability of coding errors. This requires breaking your process into many little steps, each of which you should be able to check in some way. If you can, visualise your data or somehow get a sanity check if your data looks roughly like what you’d expect. Ideally, compare your outputs to someone who’s independently implemented the same thing.

text: So my code is working as expected, but it’s doing a lot of memory allocations in the multi threading. Wanted someone to verify the approach
